German Sample Sentence: Sie schrien laut während des Spiels
English Adverb: They shouted loudly during the match.

German Sample Sentence: Er ging langsam durch den Park
English Adverb: He walked slowly through the park.

German Sample Sentence: Die Tänzerin bewegte sich graziös über die Bühne
English Adverb: The dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
